experience.title: Cybersoft
experience.description: I am a results-driven Software Engineer at CyberSoft, contributing to the success of the REM/KEP Project (Registered Email System/Kayıtlı Elektronik Posta). In this role, I have demonstrated proficiency in developing robust and scalable solutions, leveraging my expertise in Hibernate, Spring, and Java technologies. Key Achievements: Vue.js Front-end Development: Spearheaded the development of intuitive and user-friendly front-end interfaces for the KEP sales application. Utilized Vue.js to create dynamic and responsive pages, enhancing the overall user experience and contributing to increased sales efficiency.REM/KEP Project Maintenance: Played a pivotal role in the maintenance and evolution of the REM/KEP Project, ensuring its continual optimization, reliability, and adherence to industry standards. This involved troubleshooting, debugging, and implementing enhancements to meet evolving business requirements.Java and Spring Expertise: Leveraged my deep understanding of Java and Spring frameworks to streamline and enhance the functionality of the REM/KEP Project. Implemented best practices and design patterns to ensure a robust and scalable architecture. Collaborative Problem-Solving: Actively collaborated with cross-functional teams, including project managers, QA engineers, and business stakeholders, fostering a collaborative environment that accelerated project delivery and exceeded client expectations. Agile Development: Embraced Agile methodologies, contributing to the project's adaptability and responsiveness to changing requirements. Successfully delivered incremental updates and features within tight deadlines. I am passionate about creating innovative solutions that drive business success. My commitment to excellence, coupled with a proactive approach to problem-solving, has been instrumental in the ongoing success of the REM/KEP Project at CyberSoft. Connect with me to explore how my skills can contribute to your organization's success or discuss potential collaboration opportunities.

personalInfo: I like chatting with my colleagues, people in my normal life, sharing what I have learned, being social. I like to travel and research different cultures and countries, especially Europe and Anatolia. I am interested in world history and I like to research historical events, civilizations, epics, heroes, mythological events and human history and watch movies and TV series related to that subject.
personalInfo2: I play the guitar and I am interested in music, I do sports, especially the gym, I care about my personal development, I eat healthy, mental health comes first for me, I have made exercises such as meditation, mindfulness, wim hof breathing method routine in my life.
